H0.text: In which year was the storming of the Bastille, which started the French Revolution. 1775

H2.text: In which year was the storming of the Bastille, which started the French Revolution. 1793

H3.text: In which year was the storming of the Bastille, which started the French Revolution. 1789

A4.text: The Storming of the Bastille... occurred in Paris, France, on 14 July 1789

A5.text: the fall of the Bastille marks the first time the regular citizens of Paris, the sans-culottes, made a major intervention into the Revolution's affairs
